universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler

Interface FragmentAnnotationHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler, WebFragmentAnnotationHandler

    public interface FragmentAnnotationHandler
extends AnnotationHandler
    An AnnotationHandler extended interface for annotation handlers from the Fragments library that are used to handle processing of annotations attached to classes derived from BaseFragment class provided by this library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    BaseFragment

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NO_RES
      Constant used to determine that no resource has been specified.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getContentViewBackgroundResId(int defaultResId)
      Returns the background resource id obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.background() attribute.
      int getContentViewResource(int defaultViewResource)
      Returns the content view layout resource obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.value() attribute.
      boolean shouldAttachContentViewToContainer()
      Returns a boolean flag obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.attachToContainer() attribute.

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler.AnnotationHandler

        getAnnotatedClass

    • Field Detail

      • NO_RES

        static final int NO_RES
        Constant used to determine that no resource has been specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • shouldAttachContentViewToContainer

        boolean shouldAttachContentViewToContainer()
        Returns a boolean flag obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.attachToContainer() attribute.
        Returns:
        True if attaching to container has been requested via annotation, false otherwise.

      • getContentViewResource

        @LayoutRes
int getContentViewResource(@LayoutRes
                                       int defaultViewResource)
        Returns the content view layout resource obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.value() attribute.
        Parameters:
        defaultViewResource - Default layout resource to be returned if there is no annotation presented or resource is not specified.
        Returns:
        Via annotation specified layout resource or defaultViewResource.

      • getContentViewBackgroundResId

        @ColorRes
 @DrawableRes
int getContentViewBackgroundResId(int defaultResId)
        Returns the background resource id obtained from @ContentView annotation (if presented) from ContentView.background() attribute.
        Parameters:
        defaultResId - Default background resource id to be returned if there is no annotation presented or resource is not specified.
        Returns:
        Via annotation specified background resource id or defaultResId.
